content.raw:
I hate to say it, but this is not the correct way to transform an axis-aligned bounding box from one frame to another.

To illustrate this, suppose you have the yellow box below:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/5q9rMzd/images/3406174930-bounding.png)
‌

The current method would return the red box, but to have an axis-aligned bounding box of yellow, we really want the green box.

I can create a fix for this and open a PR.
